Service Life Cycle States

Web Service go through an existence life cycle with different states which need to be reflected in BioCatalogue. These states may include:

  • development
  • production
  • deprecated
  • discontinued
  • dead

To allow BioCatalogue to handle these states, the following requirements will need to be met:

  1. A service in BioCatalogue will be in one and only one state at a time
  2. A user with the correct permissions will be able to change the state of a service
  3. The state of the service will be displayed as a badge
  4. The 'state badge' will be clickable and will return all services in that state
  5. When a change state of a service occurs, information about the user that made the change should be recorded
  6. A notification may be sent out to designated people when a change of state occurs
